visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a column chart with the following specifications: Chart type: column, Chart title: Monthly Sales Data, Axes and labels styling: X-axis labels should be in Arial font, size 12, and color #333333. Y-axis labels should be in Arial font, size 12, and color #333333. Chart title should be in Arial font, size 16, and color #000000. Data series: Two series with the names '2022 Sales' and '2023 Sales', each containing monthly sales data. Custom colors: Series '2022 Sales' should be in blue (#0000FF) and series '2023 Sales' should be in green (#008000). Additional configurations: Chart should have a white background, a legend at the bottom, and margins of 50 pixels on all sides.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a column chart titled 'Monthly Sales Data'. The chart type is set to 'column', and it includes two data series named '2022 Sales' and '2023 Sales', each with monthly sales data. The X-axis and Y-axis labels are styled with Arial font, size 12, and color #333333. The chart title is styled with Arial font, size 16, and color #000000. The '2022 Sales' series is colored blue (#0000FF), and the '2023 Sales' series is colored green (#008000). The chart has a white background and a legend positioned at the bottom. Additionally, the chart has margins of 50 pixels on all sides to ensure proper spacing around the chart elements.
